title: Vayne = CupCake?
body: Hello everyone. I happened to find this weird Vayne thing. Instead of her name In the name after your name It instead says CupCake. Wondering if any of you guys know why.

replies.body: She got polymorphed by a bittersweet lulu i just noticed this recently when i targeted someone i play lulu with that skin a lot
One can only dream that it's for when vi and caitlyn are in the same game together :D
lets hope that someone in riot is dropping in subtle signs that its canon :<
when my friend pinged it said i was cupcake, pls fix {{champion:99}}
